groups both domain specific and horizontal are largely overseen
by the steering committee and then issues related to project-wide governance policies like code of conduct
etc are largely uh driven out of steering or delegated to appropriate subcommittee
many folks when they interact with kubernetes actually never need to interact with steering and that's actually a sign that

uh keep the cross project structure wheels going things like architecture or release
